name: Kaushal H. Nagar
about: Skilled React Native Developer with 1+ year of experience building production-grade mobile applications. Proven ability to develop robust, scalable apps with clean architecture and performance optimization. Strong in JavaScript/TypeScript with expertise in RESTful API integration, state management (Context API), and native module bridging. Experienced in implementing mobile-first UIs, real-time features with Socket.IO, and app store deployments. Passionate about writing clean, maintainable code and staying current with mobile development trends. Quick learner with experience in fast-paced environments and strong collaborative skills.

skills.API Integration: RESTful APIs (Axios), Socket.IO for real-time features

highlights: Implementing clean architecture and performance optimizations
Collaborating with cross-functional teams in fast-paced environment

details.title: Full Development Lifecycle:
details.description: Built production-ready chat app from scratch using React Native (Functional Components with Hooks) and TypeScript.

details.title: State Management:
details.description: Implemented efficient global state management using Context API across multiple chat screens.

details.title: Real-time Features:
details.description: Developed Socket.IO integration with presence detection, typing indicators, and optimized reconnection logic.

details.title: Performance Optimization:
details.description: Achieved smooth performance with FlatList optimizations for handling thousands of messages.

details.title: App Store Deployment:
details.description: Managed complete deployment process to both Apple App Store and Google Play Store.

details.title: Codebase Modernization:
details.description: Transformed legacy React Native code to modern architecture, reducing bugs by 40%.

details.title: UI/UX Improvements:
details.description: Redesigned user flows with React Navigation and implemented smooth animations using Reanimated.

details.title: API Integration:
details.description: Implemented centralized API handling with Axios interceptors, achieving 99.8% success rate.

details.title: OTA Updates:
details.description: Configured CodePush for over-the-air updates to deliver fixes without app store submissions.

responsibilities.title: Native Module Development:
responsibilities.description: Created custom native modules in Swift for React Native applications, bridging platform-specific functionality.

responsibilities.title: Performance Optimization:
responsibilities.description: Improved React Native app performance through native-side optimizations and memory management.

responsibilities.title: Technical Workshops:
responsibilities.description: Conducted workshops on mobile development best practices, including React Native performance optimization.

projects.name: React Native E-commerce Prototype
projects.description: Developed a cross-platform e-commerce app prototype with product listings, cart functionality, and responsive UI.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Built responsive personal portfolio with HTML, CSS, JS showcasing projects and skills.

availability.contractPreference: Open to 6-month contract (extendable based on performance)
